traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
{n}Quiet laughter reaches your ears.{/n}
"Your legs require direction, Merchant mine,
Therefore, address your pleas to them, not me.
Their thirst for dancing may yet spur them on!"

traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito
ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
{n}安静的笑声传入了你的耳中。{/n}
“你的双腿需要指引。
请向它们提出请求，我的商人。
对舞蹈的渴望，或许会唤醒它们！”
languages.original_text:
{n}Quiet laughter reaches your ears.{/n}
"Your legs require direction, Merchant mine,
Therefore, address your pleas to them, not me.
Their thirst for dancing may yet spur them on!"

traits.locale_text:
{n}安静的笑声传入了你的耳中。{/n}
“你的双腿需要指引。
请向它们提出请求，我的商人。
对舞蹈的渴望，或许会唤醒它们！”
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
{n}控えめな笑いが聞こえる。{/n}
「脚は指示を必要としている
だから、私ではなく、彼らに懇願しなさい。
踊りを渇望し、再び動き出すかもしれない！」
languages.original_text:
{n}Quiet laughter reaches your ears.{/n}
"Your legs require direction, Merchant mine,
Therefore, address your pleas to them, not me.
Their thirst for dancing may yet spur them on!"

traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
{n}Un rire discret parvient à vos oreilles.{/n}
« À vous de diriger vos jambes, {mf|Marchand très cher|Marchande très chère},
Adressez-leur vos suppliques, car je ne peux rien y faire.
Une invitation à danser pourrait les rendre plus légères ! »
languages.original_text:
{n}Quiet laughter reaches your ears.{/n}
"Your legs require direction, Merchant mine,
Therefore, address your pleas to them, not me.
Their thirst for dancing may yet spur them on!"

Une invitation à danser pourrait les rendre plus légères ! »
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
{n}Leises Gelächter dringt an deine Ohren.{/n}
"Eure Beine bedürfen Anweisungen, {mf|Händler|Händlerin},
drum richtet Eure Bitte an sie, nicht an mich.
Ihr Hunger nach Tanz belebt sie vielleicht noch!"
languages.original_text:
{n}Quiet laughter reaches your ears.{/n}

Therefore, address your pleas to them, not me.

traits.locale_text:
{n}Kulaklarına sessiz bir gülüş ulaşıyor.{/n}
"Bacaklarına yön gerek, şahsımın Tüccarı,
Bana değil, yakarışlarını onlara yönelt.
Belki de harekete geçirir onları dans aşkları!"
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito
